segue_the_chain: The opposite of a ‘Time For Action’ is to ‘Slow down’ which is a line from this song…

segue_dave.line: For sounds like four, so, from the album called "FOUR"...
segue_dave.explanation: The word for, from the previous track name, sounds like the word four, belonging to the title of the album from which the next track is taken ("FOUR").
